September-15-2017

1，ASCII Generator

In ASCII Generator, you can generate your ASCII texts。

Such like the XIXIA！


2，Chris.com

Chris.com collects a lot of ASCII pics, such like the world map：


Elephant.


3，Welcome to lost in Xixia

The 404 page of Xixia, is based on ASCII pics and ASCII texts!

So, warmly welcome you to lost in Xixia!
